articles.title: What is Canada Day? We explain
articles.description: Canada Day is exactly what it sounds like: a federal holiday to celebrate the country and show off national pride.

articles.title: Why West Bank annexation poses an existential threat to Jordan

articles.author: Toyin Owoseje, CNN
articles.title: 'We were in that first wave of creative diarrhea' -- Chris O'Dowd says celebrities' 'Imagine' cover was a mistake
articles.description: Chris O'Dowd admits that singing John Lennon's "Imagine" amid the coronavirus pandemic was not the greatest idea.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: NASA astronauts conduct second spacewalk for space station power upgrades
articles.description: Early Wednesday, NASA astronauts Chris Cassidy and Robert Behnken began a spacewalk outside of the International Space Station to replace lithium ion batteries for one of the station's power channels. It is expected to last for seven hours.

articles.title: Reopening the economy doesn't mean Covid-19 is getting better. It just shifts more responsibility to you
articles.description: It's easy to fall into a false sense of security now that states have reopened. And some are already paying the price.

articles.author: Anneken Tappe, CNN Business
articles.title: America's job market is starting to recover. But don't hold your breath
articles.description: Economists expect another month of record job growth in America as the economy is getting on its long path to recovery from the pandemic lockdown. Yet the jobs crisis is far from over.

articles.title: Mississippi changing its flag isn't the end of Confederate symbols in state flags

articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: 2020's biggest difference with 2016: Trump loses the honesty debate
articles.description: President Donald Trump was able to win in 2016 because he was seen as the lesser of two evils. His victory came from the voters who didn't like either candidate. A large part of that came from the belief that voters saw neither one as honest.

articles.title: Lionel Messi scores 700th career goal in style but Barcelona loses more ground in title race
articles.description: Lionel Messi scored a wonderful panenka penalty to bring up his 700th career goal for club and country on Tuesday.

articles.author: Jill Disis, Eric Cheung and Will Ripley, CNN Business
articles.title: Security law could hurt Hong Kong as a global business hub
articles.description: China's imposition of its sweeping national security law on Hong Kong has already divided the business community. Now executives are anxiously waiting to see whether its implementation will undermine the city's role as a global finance and trading hub.

articles.title: Italian police seize over $1 billion of 'ISIS-made' amphetamines
articles.description: Police in Italy have confiscated a huge shipment of 14 metric tonnes (15.4 US tons) of amphetamines which they say was produced by ISIS in Syria.

articles.author: Hadas Gold and Steven Jiang, CNN Business
articles.title: China hits back at US with new media restrictions as tensions rise
articles.description: China has hit back at what it calls Washington's "suppression of Chinese media" by demanding that four US news organizations declare details of their finances and staffing in the country.
